## Performance Issue

A clear and concise description of the performance problem.

## Performance Metrics

- **Observed Response Time**: [e.g. 5 seconds]
- **Expected Response Time**: [e.g. < 1 second]
- **Resource Usage**: [e.g. high CPU, memory leak]
- **Browser Performance**: [e.g. slow rendering, unresponsive UI]

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Perform action '...'
3. Observe performance issue

## Environment

- **Plugin Version**: [e.g. 0.1.0]
- **Headlamp Version**: [e.g. 0.12.0]
- **Kubernetes Cluster Size**: [e.g. 10 nodes, 100 pods]
- **Browser**: [e.g. Chrome 118.0.0.0]
- **OS**: [e.g. macOS 14.0]
- **Hardware**: [e.g. MacBook Pro M2, 16GB RAM]

## Performance Data

If available, include performance data:

- Browser DevTools performance profile
- Network timing information
- Memory usage screenshots
- CPU usage data

## Impact

- [ ] Minor inconvenience
- [ ] Noticeable slowdown
- [ ] Significant impact on usability
- [ ] Blocks core functionality

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the performance issue here.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched for existing performance issues
- [ ] I have provided performance metrics
- [ ] I have tested with the latest version
- [ ] I have included environment details
